scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run package:dev && npm run deploy:packaged:dev
scripts.deploy:packaged:dev: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --s3-bucket case-consulting-sam-deployments --s3-prefix intern-lab-stack-dev --stack-name intern-lab-stack-dev --parameter-overrides Stage=dev
scripts.reinstall: npm ci && cd get-submission && npm ci cd ../create-submission npm ci
